title: One Story to Rule Them All!
intro: Once upon a time not so long ago.. Tommy used to work on the docs. Union's been on stike, he's down on his luck it's tough, so tough. Gina works the Diner all day. Working for her many, she brings home her pay for love.

items.prompt: Select 3 items to take with you on your trip.

walk_down_hallway_1.plot: You stumble down the hallway, the sounds of their breathing not far behind you! You see a door ahead. You do not see any light coming out from the bottom of the door, only darkness.

prompt.text: Do you go through the door, or keep going and try to find another way out!?

choices.text: Keep running and try to find another way out!
Curl into a ball and rock back and forth while crying
Quickly look at map to find out where door leads.

open_door_1.plot: You turn the nob on the door. You can feel the ware on the nob as the gritty almost sandpaper like metal clings to your palm. The door as some resistance to it as you push it open. As the door opens it reveals a pitch black room. You instinctively rais your hand to the side of the inside wall blindly searching for a light switch. You find one! You flick it on and a florecent bulb flashes and stutters on. As the light illuminates the room you can see it is a tiny room with a set of double doors to the back about 20 feet. They are elevator doors. The only other thing in the room is the elevator control panel, and a sign that reads "Maintenance Eleveator: Floor 1". You run into the room and see the control panel for the elevator has an up button and a down button.

choices.text: Forget the elevator, head back to the hall!
